DOC.brief_summary: TARGET-HCC is a longitudinal, observational study of patients being managed for HCC in usual clinical practice. TARGET-HCC will create a research registry of participants with HCC within academic and community real-world practices in order to assess the safety and effectiveness of the entire spectrum of current and future therapies across diverse populations.
DOC.brief_title: A 5-year Longitudinal Observational Study of the Natural History and Management of Patients With HCC
